bug.author: lfoppiano
bug.summary: No text in boxes in "PDF reference annotation"
bug.description:
I was testing the PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kermitt2/grobid/pull/533>#533</denchmark-link> and I found that there is a small bug in the interface "PDF reference annotation": <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15426/75510982-92e33200-59e4-11ea-978d-3eff10b260c3.png></denchmark-link>
In fact when hovering over a reference identifier, it does not show correctly the reference text in the box: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15426/75510955-7ba44480-59e4-11ea-853d-ac27c1d17b94.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
Hi Luca! It works for me, same file and ref. <denchmark-link:https://arxiv.org/pdf/0912.1391.pdf>https://arxiv.org/pdf/0912.1391.pdf</denchmark-link>
This always worked for me (except to some small coordinates shifts due to OCR). It might be due to your tests ;) <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2340795/75541749-ca6ed000-5a1e-11ea-874a-0c6e719ed6c2.png></denchmark-link>
I re-tested with both Chrome and Firefox and, indeed. It works.
